phrases.author: web
phrases.body: If You have always resisted authority, this might be a sign that you are may be an entrepreneur.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: Are You a people person? You have no problem communicating with people!

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: No matter what you do on a daily basis, you always think of it in terms of delivering a return on investment, or?..

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: You’re a charming and charismatic person, I hope.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: You’re very opinionated. That's another reason you got fired a lot.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: You surround yourself with quality people - not leeches who will bring you down.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: You believe that your time is worth more than money.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: Feeling cared for by one’s supervisor has a more significant impact on people’s sense of trust and safety than any other behavior by a leader.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: Understand the fact that frequently life is not fair.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: Mentally strong people embrace change and they welcome challenge. Their biggest fear, if they have one, is not of the unknown, but of becoming complacent and stagnant.
